comments:
after converting 2 plugins and 1 fragment (the plugins are dependent fwiw) to 
osgi bundles, i tried to export the plugins and fragments in the usual way. 
 
When hitting "next" on the export wizard's first screen, the following error 
occurs, and I cannot continue.  
 
this issue is blocking the release of our plugin for M6.

M6 has some known bugs that have been fixed in later I builds. Shipping a 
product on top of it is at your own risks.
After this warning moving to pde-ui.

belay this bug, it's due to some bogus osgi stuff i was doing. i just 
restarted, and didn't bother with the osgi conversion, everything's fine.
